reviews.sentence: Room was excellent and the front desk staff was even better.
So so. Staff was friendly and very accommodating. No pool towels waited 10 minutes for a towel. The location was not too hot and when are hotels going to learn to offer more than just ESPN channels.
Stayed one night to be close to Navy Base. good proximity to that and hotel was nice clean and front desk was cordial. recommend it.

Clean and Comfortable Loved the hotel. Friendly and competent staff. Location was good for family reunion. did not use dinner or breakfast facilities but drinks at bar and bar service were fine. Only one negative for me elevator carpets had been heavily treated with a carpet deodorizer rather than shampooed. The product made me cough.
Great stay my husband and I really enjoyed ourselves. The room was nice and the staff was friendly. The bed was hard.

They difinately leave the lights on for you. The housekeeping staff is very friendly the room was clean. We called several days in advance letting them know we had be checking in around midnight because you lose your room if you do not let them know you are checking in after 11. When we got there no one was at the front desk to let us in. We stood in the foyer for about 5 minutes with the phone ringing no one came to answer. After about 5 more minutes another guest came in with a key card they let us into the front lobby where we stood around another few minutes until the desk clerk came out of wherever he was to check us in. After working 8 hours driving 10 then standing around for almost 20 minutes trying to get checked in his funny comments that we might be in the wrong place were not funny at all. The curtains did not shut so there was light from a parking lot shining in all night. we had to tie them shut to block it so we could sleep. When we were walking to the room a couple doors down looked like they had flooded there were blowers going 247 in the hall so it was pretty noisy. There is no continental breakfast I was charged 1095 for a half cup yes I measured because I am on a diet of plain yogurt with a spoon of granola on top. My husband had a cup of fruit 2 pieces of bacon 2 eggs a small glass of OJ. Our ticket was 25 none of it was prepared to order it was stuff that was just out like a normal hotel does. Totally ridiculous. Not to mention the issue with logging into the Wi Fi so my husband could finish working the following morning. UGH. I am glad I only make this trip every other year. Next trip I will not be staying here.
Beautiful room friendly service it is everything you expect from Hilton.
the staff is polite helpful friendly. they even baked 2 dozen cookies for my kids before bedtime.

My husband and I stayed one night here on New Years Eve. We paid for a double queen on the first floor. The price was decent. Around 1200. After checking out we received 2 phone calls. One from the desk saying card declined and another from local law enforcement stating there was a negligent balance of 300 for the room. Apparently we were charged a smoking fee upwards of 2500. Our first floor room was directly beside the exit door to smoking area. Me nor my husband smoke and it ’s an impossible task locating any hotel staff. I will never stay at this corrupt underhanded and negligent establishment again.
GreAt customer service and check in experience. Very good service.
